headline: Confluent Shareholders Back IBM Deal As Valuation And Growth Stay In Focus
summary: Confluent (NasdaqGS:CFLT) shareholders have approved the merger agreement for the company to become a wholly owned subsidiary of IBM. The approval followed a special shareholder meeting, clearing a key hurdle for the transaction to move forward. The companies are now advancing the integration process as Confluent prepares to operate under IBM ownership. Confluent focuses on data streaming software that helps enterprises process and act on data in real time. For IBM, bringing Confluent into...

headline: IBM AI Criticism Tests Value Of New Storage And Defense Wins
summary: IBM (NYSE:IBM) is under public fire over its AI strategy as influential market voices question the company’s direction. At the same time, IBM is rolling out one of its most significant AI powered storage systems in years. The company has also secured a multi billion dollar defense contract that leans heavily on its AI capabilities. For investors watching IBM at a share price of $262.38, the debate is not just about headlines; it is about how sentiment matches up with execution. The stock is...

headline: XRP Gains 2.6% As a Wave of Ripple Partnerships Are Announced
summary: XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) is trading at $1.4731 on Monday, up 2.6% from where it traded a week ago. Overall, the token trades 19.6% below its January 1 price and 59% from where it traded during July. headline: IBM vs. Intel: Which AI-Focused Stock is the Better Buy Today?
summary: IBM edges out Intel with stronger estimates, cheaper valuation and hybrid cloud-AI momentum despite fierce competition and margin pressure.
